extendedInfo.description: Race against the clock in a two-minute blitz to clear lines and rack up as many points as possible before time runs out! With all-new features, stunning visuals, and innovative controls, this twist on the world-famous puzzle game is a must-have on your Android phone or tablet.ââ¦a perfect mobile gameâ¦â (Examiner.com)ââ¦the engaging mayhem that is Tetris Blitz wouldnât let me tear my eyes off those blocks.â (Polygon)SHATTER HIGH SCORESSupercharge your game and trigger point-boosting reactions with Power-ups, like Magnet, Laser, and Time Shift. With a new Power-up released every week, the strategic combinations are endless!FEEL THE FRENZYExperience explosive effects and earn double points when you trigger the elusive Frenzy mode. Clear lines back-to-back to stay in Frenzy and get blown away by stunning cascades that keep the points rolling in.PLAY YOUR FRIENDSCelebrate your high score and brag as you fly past your friends on the Facebook leaderboards. Tournaments reset every week â so thereâs always another chance for victory.  BLITZ YOUR WAYTake charge of your game with all-new controls like the innovative âDrag-and-Placeâ option that lets you tap and drag pieces with precision. You can also choose the lightning fast âOne-Touchâ controls or âSwipeâ placement if you prefer the original controls.FINISHERS AND DAILY BLITZWatch your game end in a point-boosting, mind-blowing blast of visual fun with Finishers! You can also try to clear the board with the Bonus Blitz and score rewards like Coin packs, Power-up bundles, and more.Are you ready to Blitz? Come feel the frenzy now!You must be 13+ to play this game.

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Love it. Lots of points to be scored, cool specials & finishers. Solid game w/no glitches. Enjoy!
reviews.author: Jeffrey Thompson

reviews.title: Thanks!
reviews.comment: I got my Blitz back! :-D

reviews.title: Problem with ads is fixed
reviews.comment: Much better to play now that ads don\'t block the game.

reviews.comment: Lots of fun,  wish I didn\'t have to jump through hoops for coins.

reviews.title: Tetris blitz
reviews.comment: This is really awesome like  all ya\'ll should try it  it an good strategy game

reviews.title: Great game fc\'s too much
reviews.comment: I have a Droid razr and i can\'t tell you how often it fc\'s i can\'t log onto fb with it anymore B.C. cause it just force closes great game just can\'t play it

reviews.comment: cool spin on classic game but can u add like 1 more minute

reviews.title: Very satisfied
reviews.comment: So far no complaints. Like the new app. More ways to win.

reviews.comment: I own a HTC EVO 4G. This game will not work. Stuck with Original Tetris.

reviews.title: Excellent fun
reviews.comment: Original.  Just when you thought there was nothing else to do with Tetrisr.  This is fabulous fun.
reviews.author: Gary Coleman

reviews.title: LOVE TETRIS!
reviews.comment: Loved the next tetris for PS1 cuz of the cascading effect, which is awesome. Just wish there was another game mode or two so i could play for longer than 2 minutes at a time. I dont care for the regular version of tetris app, this one is better. Make another mode thats not timed and I will give it 5stars.
reviews.author: jessica Daniels

reviews.title: I didn\'t think I would like it but I absolutely love it.
reviews.comment: Very fun game.
reviews.author: Joel Bolden

reviews.title: Best mind blowing game ever.
reviews.comment: The best game to pass the time. Warning though you may end up losing track of time.
reviews.author: Joshua Clark

reviews.title: Quite fun
reviews.comment: Although with it stalling freezing or stopping this app is very sensitive to my device such as adjusting my volume the game quits and while it loads it quits during game play I enjoy this game they need to fix stalling issues
reviews.author: Jeremiah Osterman

reviews.title: Sweet!
reviews.comment: Great game! I\'ve been hooked ever since I got it!
reviews.author: Franky Perez

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Also integrated with the regular Tetris app by EA, so you can launch blitz from there too. Kinda sad though they have to resort to finishers for advertising because I bought no ads.

reviews.title: Takes me back to gameboy days. Relaxing to play.
reviews.comment: Always loved this game. Find it a little easy from previous versions but just started.
